comments.comments_text: Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Memphis Depay (Lyon) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.

comments.comments_text: Danny Makkelie shows a yellow card to Leo Dubois (Lyon) for a tough tackle.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows a yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for a tough tackle.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Ederson. 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of [PLAYER]. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: No offside! Referee Danny Makkelie points to the centre spot to indicate that the goal stands after the VAR review. The Lyon players celebrate.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: No offside! Referee [REFEREE] points to the centre spot to indicate that the goal stands after the VAR review. The [TEAM] players celebrate.

comments.comments_text: Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

comments.comments_text: Fernandinho (Manchester City) delivers a fine lofted cross into the penalty area, but it's cleared by an opposing player. Manchester City have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Rodri (Manchester City) was quite harsh and Danny Makkelie didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Raheem Sterling produces a sweet pass and picks out Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) inside the box. He quickly takes a shot which goes into the bottom right corner and leaves the goalkeeper helpless. He makes it 1:1!

comments.comments_text: Moussa Dembele (Lyon) scores a goal from medium range. He finds some space to collect a pass and produces a low drive that goes inside the net. The goalkeeper couldn't make a save, despite the ball going into the middle of the goal.

comments.comments_text: The goal stands! That took a long time for referee Danny Makkelie to decide it wasn’t offside. The relieved Lyon players can finally celebrate.
